physical_appearance: This is a pair of doorway hangings or todaliyan. They are 'L' shaped, featuring cotton weave with embroidery work. The hangings are decorated with stylized foliage, animals, and deities. The panels of images are bordered by scrolling geometric patterns.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) deities depictions (visual works) geometric motifs beadwork (visual works)
